hardforks.name: Shelley hard fork
hardforks.description: The main objectives of the Shelley upgrade were to increase network decentralization, enhance security, and enable stakeholder participation through staking and delegation.

hardforks.name: Mary hard fork
hardforks.description: With the Mary upgrade, the blockchain became capable of hosting and handling native assets on its network.

hardforks.name: Alonzo hard fork
hardforks.description: The upgrade was named after Alonzo Church, a renowned logician and mathematician. It introduced the Plutus platform v1.0, which is a smart contract development platform.

hardforks.name: Vasil hard fork
hardforks.description: The upgrade enhances Cardano's smart contract capabilities through Plutus v2. The main additions that Vasil unlocks are: Reference inputs (CIP 31), Inline datums (CIP-32), Reference scripts (CIP-33), Datums and redeemers, Data Serialisation primitive (CIP 42)
